content.en: Smart load forecasting: Researchers have been exploring the use of computational intelligence techniques and algorithms to improve the accuracy of electric load forecasting. These techniques include neural networks, evolutionary algorithms, and optimization algorithms. By combining these algorithms with data preprocessing and advanced optimization techniques, researchers aim to develop more efficient and accurate models for short-term and mid-term load forecasting in smart power grids and urban smart grid systems.
content.da: Smart load forecasting: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af computerbaserede intelligens teknikker og algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af elektrisk belastningsprognoser. Disse teknikker inkluderer neurale netværk, evolutionære algoritmer og optimeringsalgoritmer. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med datapræbehandling og avancerede optimeringsteknikker, sigter forskere mod at udvikle mere effektive og præcise modeller til kort- og mellemlangsigtede belastningsprognoser i smarte elnet og urbane smart grid systemer.
